innovation_discovery.description: Identify and scale grassroots innovation opportunities at Humana
innovation_discovery.example_prompt: I discovered that teams in Operations are manually processing vendor reports. How can we turn this into an innovation opportunity?

ai_leadership_positioning.description: Strategic actions to build AI leadership credibility
ai_leadership_positioning.example_prompt: How can I use next week's team meeting to demonstrate AI leadership?

corporate_navigation.description: Navigate complex corporate dynamics while driving change
corporate_navigation.example_prompt: How should I approach the IT security team about relaxing some AI tool restrictions?

solution_implementation.description: Design and implement practical solutions within constraints
solution_implementation.example_prompt: Design a document search assistant using only approved Humana tools

advocates_strategy.description: Maximize impact through the Advocates Program
advocates_strategy.example_prompt: How can I use the next Advocates meeting to build momentum for AI adoption?

quick_win_generator.description: Identify and implement quick wins that build credibility
quick_win_generator.example_prompt: What's a 1-week AI project that would impress leadership?

strategic_synthesis.description: Comprehensive analysis combining all strategic elements
strategic_synthesis.example_prompt: Analyze the opportunity to lead an AI Center of Excellence at Humana

usage_patterns.daily_planning: Use 'ai_leadership_positioning' each morning to identify high-impact actions
